title: Italian settlement in the Yarra Valley
creator_credit: Maria McCarthy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Maria McCarthy recalls the stories from her youth, the ones told about her families’ voyage from Italy to Australia and settling in the Yarra Valley. She tells of her parents’ adoption of a new culture and way of life and the legacy of those decisions on the present.
creator_credit_for_label: Maria McCarthy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
